statements: SELECT * FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics
SELECT pitcher_id, ERA FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics
SELECT strikeouts, WHIP FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE strikeouts > 100
SELECT * FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY ERA DESC
SELECT AVG(ERA), SUM(strikeouts) FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics
SELECT * FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE strikeouts > 100 ORDER BY ERA DESC, WHIP ASC
SELECT pitcher_id, strikeouts FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE ERA < 3.5
SELECT AVG(ERA) AS avg_era, MAX(strikeouts) AS max_strikeouts FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics
SELECT * FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE strikeouts BETWEEN 50 AND 80 ORDER BY strikeouts ASC
SELECT pitcher_id, ERA, WHIP FROM PitcherPerformanceMetrics WHERE WHIP < 1.2
SELECT * FROM PitcherMetrics WHERE ERA < 3.00;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT pitcher_id, strikeouts FROM PitcherMetrics ORDER BY strikeouts DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT AVG(ERA), MAX(knockouts), MIN(WHIP) FROM PitcherMetrics;
SELECT * FROM PitcherMetrics WHERE strikeouts > 100 ORDER BY ERA DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY jersey_number ASC;
SELECT pitcher_id, strikeouts, WHIP FROM PitcherMetrics WHERE ERA < 3.50 AND strikeouts >= 50 ORDER BY WHIP ASC;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number, team_id FROM TeamRoster WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR player_name LIKE '%y' ORDER BY team_id, jersey_number DESC;

SELECT TeamRoster.player_name, PitcherMetrics.ERA FROM TeamRoster JOIN PitcherMetrics ON TeamRoster.pitcher_id = PitcherMetrics.pitcher_id WHERE PitcherMetrics.strikeouts > 75 ORDER BY PitcherMetrics.ERA ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM PitcherMetrics
SELECT pitcher_id, era, strikeouts FROM PitcherMetrics WHERE strikeouts > 100
SELECT date, opponent, location FROM Games WHERE location = 'Home'
SELECT pitcher_id, game_id, strikeouts FROM PitcherGameStats WHERE strikeouts >= 10
SELECT * FROM PitcherMetrics WHERE ERA < 3.00 ORDER BY strikeouts DESC
SELECT * FROM PitcherMetrics
SELECT pitcher_id, era, strikeouts FROM PitcherMetrics ORDER BY strikeouts DESC
SELECT game_id, opponent, location FROM Games WHERE location = 'Home'
SELECT * FROM PitcherGameStats WHERE hits > 5 AND strikeouts > 10
SELECT pitcher_id, game_id, runs FROM PitcherGameStats ORDER BY runs ASC
SELECT * FROM Pitchers
SELECT pitcher_name, era, strikeouts FROM Pitchers ORDER BY strikeouts DESC
SELECT player_name, era FROM PlayerStats WHERE era < 3.00
SELECT game_id, date, attendance FROM Games WHERE attendance > 50000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) as total_players FROM Teams INNER JOIN PlayerStats ON Teams.team_id = PlayerStats.team_id GROUP BY team_name
SELECT pitcher_name, era, strikeouts FROM Pitchers;
SELECT * FROM Games WHERE attendance > 50000;
SELECT player_name, era, strikeouts FROM PlayerStats WHERE strikeouts > 100 AND team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT team_name, AVG(strikeouts) AS avg_strikeouts FROM PlayerStats GROUP BY team_id HAVING AVG(strikeouts) > 150;
SELECT player_name, era, strikeouts FROM pitchers;
SELECT * FROM games ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, manager FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, date, stadium, attendance FROM games WHERE attendance > 50000;
SELECT player_name, strikeouts, whip FROM pitchers WHERE era < 3.00;
SELECT player_name, era, strikeouts FROM pitchers WHERE era > 3.00 ORDER BY strikeouts DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, manager FROM teams WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT game_id, date, stadium, attendance FROM games WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT player_name, hits, runs, walks FROM pitchers_stats WHERE hits > 10 AND runs < 5 ORDER BY hits ASC;
SELECT team_name, runs, hits, errors FROM teams_stats WHERE runs > 5 AND errors = 0 ORDER BY runs DESC, hits ASC;
